page.title: 06CULLOMPTON POLICE
page.content: The police from the station cover Cullompton and other villages.They travel in Panda cars and work in shifts.Some are community policemen for specific villages.They have a truncheon,handcuffs and radios.Their main problems are teenagers with eighteen year olds commiting most offences,theft being a common problem.As the population has increased so has crime.If a prisoner is brought in he is allowed to inform someone by phoning and is then kept in the 3m*4m cell.As there are not enough officers to watch prisoners they do not stay long.Some vandalism occurs in the cells. The police feel they do not solve crimes today,but act more like the fire_brigade.
